title: Bridge Error Response Message
description: A response message from the Bridge back to the original Desktop Agent that raised the request, used where all connected agents returned errors.

type.title: Response Message Type
type.description: Identifies the type of the message and it is typically set to the FDC3 function name that the message relates to, e.g. 'findIntent', with 'Response' appended.

payload.title: Response Error Message Payload
payload.description: The error message payload contains details of an error return to the app or agent that raised the original request.

BridgeErrorResponseMeta.title: Bridge Response Metadata
BridgeErrorResponseMeta.description: Metadata required in a response message collated and/or forwarded on by the Bridge
